description: {"blocks":[{"key":"m56f","text":"This protocol details methods for 3-day Mitochondrial Antigen Presentation Assay in a murine macrophage cell line (RAW) that expresses a glycoprotein B (gB) of herpes simplex virus 1 (HSV1) targeted to the mitochondrial matrix (mito-gB). A gB-specific CD8+ T cell hybridoma recognizing the gB498–505peptide loaded on MHC class I molecules is also used to monitor antigen presentation through a beta-galactosidase assay kit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":292,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
